definition: just at that time/as it happens/by good luck, just then
to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: You met me on the reficwhaty strange time in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我們相遇的時刻，適值是我人的生活中最詭奇的時期。

sentences.english: It was a nice sickly season just at this time.
sentences.chinese: 當時適值疾病流行的美妙季節。

sentences.english: We happened to arrive there in the rainy season.
